excerpt: The TMCM-1211 "StepRocker" is a single axis motor controller/driver board for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors. It features the TRINAMIC motion controller/motor driver TMC5160 in combination with an ARM Cortex-M4™ (MK20DX128VLK7) processor. The module is intended to be a fully functional development platform.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesDcStep™MicroPlyer™CoolStep™SpreadCycle™StallGuard2™StealthChop2™

Documentation: TMCM-1211 TMCL Firmware Manual FW V1.10 Rev 1.00
